export PATH=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/tools:$PATH

[Android for armeabi-v7a]
-------------------------------------------
make OS=android NDKROOT=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/android-ndk-r14b/ TARGET=ardroid-12 PREFIX=./out/ clean
make OS=android ARCH=arm APP_ABI=armeabi-v7a NDKROOT=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/android-ndk-r14b/ TARGET=ardroid-12 PREFIX=./out/ -j8 install



[Android for x86]
-------------------------------------------
make OS=android NDKROOT=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/android-ndk-r14b/ TARGET=ardroid-12 PREFIX=./out/ clean
make OS=android ARCH=x86 APP_ABI=x86 NDKROOT=/home/frank/Android/Sdk/ndk/android-ndk-r14b/ TARGET=ardroid-12 PREFIX=./out/ install -j8 install
